title: DAOU Tasting
description:
Join us on Wednesday, February 11, from 4–7 PM at Whispering Vine South Creek for a tasting showcasing the bold, polished style that has made DAOU one of Paso Robles’ most celebrated producers.

Tasting Fee: $25 (Buy a bottle from the tasting and your fee is refunded)

Featured Wines:

• DAOU Reserve Cabernet Sauvignon 2023 – Rich and layered with blackberry, plum, chocolate-covered blueberry, cedar, and refined tannins that carry through a long, elegant finish.

• DAOU Cabernet Sauvignon 2023 – 91 pts Wine Enthusiast – Clean and approachable with cherry, blackberry, mocha spice, toasted wood, and a touch of thyme.

• DAOU Pessimist Red Blend 2023 – Aromatic and expressive with blueberry, boysenberry, cassis, cocoa, lavender, and silky texture balanced by vibrant acidity.

• DAOU Chardonnay 2023 – Full and mouth-filling with pineapple, pear, vanilla bean, lemon cream, and crushed almond notes on a long, graceful finish.

Discover the range and craftsmanship behind DAOU’s crowd-favorite wines—buy a bottle and your tasting is free.
